gold: The statistic illustrates the public opinion on gay marriage among Italians in 2016.
According to the data , more than half of Italian adults were against same-sex marriage ( 52 percent ).
Italy recognized same-sex civil unions ( not marriage ) in June 2016 , granting to same-sex couples most of the rights of marriage except parenting ( stepchild or joint adoption ) .
